instruction: What sorts of tools and techniques are effective when teaching English to young learners?
output: It is important to use a variety of teaching techniques and tools when teaching English to young learners. Examples of techniques that can be used include the use of stories, games and other interactive activities, visual aids, and pair and group projects. Learning can also be reinforced by providing students with tasks that engage them in active practice and feedback. Additionally, encouraging students to use English to express their own ideas and opinions can help them develop their confidence and understanding of the language.
